00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * Tests for the QueryPath library.
00004  * @author M Butcher <matt@aleph-null.tv>
00005  * @license The GNU Lesser GPL (LGPL) or an MIT-like license.
00006  */
00007 
00008 require_once 'PHPUnit/Autoload.php';
00009 require_once 'src/QueryPath/QueryPath.php';
00010 require_once 'src/QueryPath/Extension/QPList.php';
00011 
00012 /**
00013  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00014  */
00015 class QPListTests extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00016   public function testAppendList() {
00017     $list = array('one', 'two', 'three');
00018     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->appendList($list, QPList::UL);
00019     $this->assertEquals(3, $qp->find(':root ul>li')->size());
00020     $this->assertEquals('one', $qp->find(':root ul>li:first')->text());
00021     
00022     $list = array('zero-one','two','three', array('four-one', 'four-two', array('four-three-one', 'four-three-two')));
00023     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->appendList($list, QPList::UL);
00024     $this->assertEquals(4, $qp->find(':root .qplist>li')->size());
00025     // Find bottom layer of recursive tree.
00026     $this->assertEquals(2, $qp->find(':root ul>li>ul>li>ul>li')->size());
00027     
00028     // Assoc array tests...
00029     $list = array('a' => 'aa', 'b' => 'bb', 'c' => 'cc');
00030     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->appendList($list, QPList::UL);
00031     $this->assertEquals('aa', $qp->find(':root .qplist>li:first')->text());
00032     
00033     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->appendList($list, QPList::DL);
00034     $this->assertEquals('a', $qp->find(':root .qplist>dt:first')->text());
00035     $this->assertEquals('aa', $qp->find(':root .qplist>dd:first')->text());
00036     //$qp->writeXML();
00037   }
00038   
00039   public function testAppendTable() {
00040     $data = array(
00041       'headers' => array('One', 'Two', 'Three'),
00042       'rows' => array(
00043         array(1, 2, 3),
00044         array('Ein', 'Zwei', 'Drei'),
00045         array('uno', 'dos', 'tres'),
00046         array('uno', 'du'), // See what happens here...
00047       ),
00048     );
00049     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->appendTable($data);
00050     $this->assertEquals(3, $qp->top()->find('th')->size());
00051     $this->assertEquals(11, $qp->top()->find('td')->size());
00052     $this->assertEquals('Zwei', $qp->eq(4)->text());
00053     
00054     // Test with an object instead...
00055     $o = new QPTableData();
00056     $o->setHeaders($data['headers']);
00057     $o->setRows($data['rows']);
00058     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->appendTable($o);
00059     $this->assertEquals(3, $qp->top()->find('th')->size());
00060     $this->assertEquals(11, $qp->top()->find('td')->size());
00061     $this->assertEquals('Zwei', $qp->eq(4)->text());
00062   }
00063 }
